title: Blazin' Music Videos (Rap, RnB, Pop) August 2011 NTSC DVDR
description:
Blazin' Music Videos August 2011 NTSC DVDR

1. Jadakiss - Toast to That (ft. Fred The Godson & Remo The Hitmaker)
2. 40 Glocc - Welcome to California (Remix ft. E-40, Too Short, Xzibit)
3. tabi Bonney - Hip-Hop & Love (ft. Murs)
4. Mac Miller - Best Day Ever
5. G-Side - How Far (ft. Victoria Tate)
6. J*Davey - Quicksand (ft. Def Sounds)
7. The Game - Pot of Gold (ft. Chris Brown)
8. Gucci Mane & Waka Flocka - She Be Puttin' On (ft. Slim Dunkin)
9. Maino - Let It Fly (ft. Roscoe Dash)
10. Lil Twist - New Money (ft. Mishon)
11. Red Cafe - We Get It On (ft. Omarion)
12. Problem - Double Dip (ft. TY$)
13. Travis Barker - Let's Go (ft. Busta Rhymes, Twista, and Yelawolf)
14. Timbaland ft. Pitbull and David Guetta - Pass At Me (Promo for: Culo by Mazzucco)
15. Pitbull - Rain Over Me (ft. Marc Anthony)
16. David Guetta - Little Bad Girl (ft. Taio Cruz and Ludacris)
17. Bobby Brackins - Fillmore Slim
18. Nicamari - Burn It Down
19. Lil Playy - Birthday dress (ft. Matthew Koma)
20. Mayer Hawthorne - A Long Time
21. Cee-Lo Green - Cry Baby
22. K-Young - Love Drunk (ft. Crooked I)
23. Mook N Fair - Sidekick (ft. Ray J)
24. Kevin McCall - Guess Who
25. J. Valentine - 4U
26. Miguel - Quickie
27. Ace Hood - Body 2 Body (ft. Chris Brown) (Director's Cut)
28. Sean Rose - Downtown (ft. Gilbere Forte)
29. YC - Like This (ft. Yung Joc)
30. Rockie Fresh and Casey Veggies - Duckin N Dodgin
31. Pusha T - Trouble On My Mind (ft. Tyler The Creator)
32. Fam-Lay - Beach Cruiser
33. Neako - LVL 2x10
34. N.O.R.E. - Slime Father (ft. Cory Gunz)
35. Gucci Mane & Waka Flocka - Ferrari Boyz
36. Strong Arm Steady - Gangstas (ft. Kobe)
37. LEP Bogus Boys - Da Bag (ft. Pac Man)
38. Yukmouth - Move Mean (ft. San Quinn and J-Ro)
39. WC - Stickin To The Script (ft. Daz, Kurupt, Soopafly, and Badazz)
40. Zion I & The Grouch - It's Going Down (ft. Jacob Hemphill)
41. Prince Ea - Backwards Rappers
42. Self Scientific - God's Language
43. Muse - The Uprising (Unofficial Video by PuppetGov)
44. Everybody Likes Ron Paul
45. Megabone - Pilldren

Total Time ~ 3:01:14
Video: NTSC 720x480 16:9 WS
Audio: AC3 2ch 192k
Menu: Yes
Format: ISO DVD Image
Date Stamp: 8-10-2011

Just a little flashback to hold you over until the next new editions of Blazin' Hot Hip-Hop and Blazin' Hot Groove. This edition sees 40 Glocc before he was a joke (fight and subsequent lawsuit vs. The Game), Murs right after he cut his dreads off, Mac Miller on his mixtape grind right before he really blew up (as well as home video footage of him rapping to Rapper's Delight when he was like 5), Slim Dunkin before his physical body was murdered, an early breakout hit for Problem ft. Ty$ (now known as Ty DollaSign, Mayer Hawthorne's awesome song and video which features old footage of a Detroit dance TV show, Jaleel White (Urkel) as Cee-Lo Green, a Rockie Fresh and Casey Veggies collabo before they both blew up, the unlikely collab of Pusha-T and Tyler the Creator, and Prince Ea spits his verse forward AND backward! Megabone closes out the show with the dope "Pilldren".

"The war on drugs is a war on us. 
They bring it on the plane and they put us on a bus. 
They give it to the kids and they want to lock us up. 
It's mass pollution, we the pilldren."

Blazin' Hot Hip-Hop drops next week if all goes well.
